sentences.en: “the onslaught of upwards of seventy divisions”(&b{Winston S. Churchill})
sentences.cn: “对七十个以上区的袭击”(&b{温斯顿S.丘吉尔})

sentences.en: an upward movement in property prices
Arms bend. Arms upward. Wait for it. Stretch.
sentences.cn: 手臂弯曲。手臂上举。保持一下。伸展。

sentences.en: Fill in gaps by using short, upward strokes of the pencil.
sentences.cn: 用铅笔向上短短地勾画几道来填充空白。
利普霍恩一声不吭，慢慢站起身来。

sentences.en: Oil prices continued an upward swing in New York this morning.
sentences.cn: 今天上午纽约油价继续上扬。

sentences.en: She gave him a quick, upward look, then lowered her eyes.
sentences.cn: 她抬眼迅速瞥了他一下，然后眼睛又垂了下去。

sentences.en: She started once again on the steep upward climb.
sentences.cn: 她又开始沿着陡峭的山路往上爬。

sentences.en: Stroke the cream onto your skin in an upward direction.
sentences.cn: 把护肤霜在皮肤上轻轻由下向上涂抹。

sentences.en: The modern airplane can arrow upward to 20, 000 feet.
sentences.cn: 现代的飞机能够如箭般地飞达20, 000英尺的高度.

sentences.en: The watch costs upward of 8000 dollars.
sentences.cn: 这块表的价钱超过8000美元.

sentences.en: There was an upward tendency in oil shares yesterday.
sentences.cn: 石油股票昨天有上涨的势头.

sentences.en: They climbed upward along the steep cliffs surrounding the village.
sentences.cn: 他们沿着村庄周围的陡峭悬崖往上爬。

sentences.en: upward pressure on bank interest rates
sentences.cn: 针对银行利率的越来越大的压力

sentences.en: Vines spiraled upward toward the roof.
sentences.cn: 藤蔓盘旋着朝屋顶方向生长。

phrases.tran_cn: 上压力；向上压力；反向压力

trans.tran_en: If someone moves or looks upward, they move or look up towards a higher place
